sdk-staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.';
sdk-staging.post-deploy: npm i ; npm update ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens --env staging ; pm2 restart 0 -- emerging-citizens --env staging

staging.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.'; git pull git@github.com:engagementgamelab/EL-Website.git master;
staging.post-deploy: npm i ; npm update ; cd /srv/framework/current/ ; npm i ; grunt compile --sites=emerging-citizens --env staging ; NODE_ENV=staging pm2 restart 0 -- emerging-citizens --env staging

sdk-production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'Cloning and running npm install. Be patient.'

production.pre-deploy-local: echo 'NPM linking emerging-citizens and restarting app.';
